metadata.description: SDAB Issues Checklist with citations for building permit applications
metadata.note: This checklist is derived from historical SDAB decisions and should be used as guidance only

issues.description: Single residential property development with variance requests. Common issues include setbacks, height, and lot coverage.
key_factors_for_denial: Development out of character for neighborhood

sample_citations.key_reasoning: Appeal allowed - DA/SA had REFUSED. Board found grounds to allow the development.
Appeal allowed - DA/SA had REFUSED. Board found grounds to allow the development.
Appeal denied - DA/SA had APPROVED. Board upheld original decision or found grounds to deny.
Appeal denied - DA/SA had APPROVED. Board upheld original decision or found grounds to deny.
Partial approval - DA/SA had APPROVED. Board imposed conditions or partial modifications.

issues.recommendation: Document site constraints thoroughly, analyze neighborhood development patterns for precedent, prepare responses to neighbor concerns, consider voluntary conditions to mitigate impacts.

issues.description: Commercial property development or change of use. Issues include parking, signage, hours of operation, and compatibility.
key_factors_for_approval: Hours of operation reasonable for area
No undue impact on adjacent residential
key_factors_for_denial: Incompatible use for zone or area
Hours of operation concern for neighbors

sample_citations.key_reasoning: Appeal allowed - DA/SA had APPROVED. Board found grounds to allow the development.
Appeal allowed - DA/SA had REFUSED. Board found grounds to allow the development.
Appeal denied - DA/SA had REFUSED. Board upheld original decision or found grounds to deny.
Appeal denied - DA/SA had APPROVED. Board upheld original decision or found grounds to deny.
Partial approval - DA/SA had APPROVED. Board imposed conditions or partial modifications.

issues.recommendation: Verify zoning permits proposed use, prepare parking analysis, document signage compliance, propose operating conditions if adjacent to residential.

issues.description: Other development types not specifically categorized. Review specific circumstances of each case.

sample_citations.key_reasoning: Appeal allowed - DA/SA had REFUSED. Board found grounds to allow the development.
Appeal allowed - DA/SA had APPROVED. Board found grounds to allow the development.
Appeal denied - DA/SA had ORDER. Board upheld original decision or found grounds to deny.
Appeal denied - DA/SA had APPROVED. Board upheld original decision or found grounds to deny.
Partial approval - DA/SA had APPROVED. Board imposed conditions or partial modifications.

issues.recommendation: Clearly articulate reasons for variance, document special circumstances, address all neighbor concerns, demonstrate compliance with bylaw intent.

issues.description: Single detached dwelling development with potential variances to setbacks, height, or lot coverage.
key_factors_for_approval: Variance requested is minimal and justified
key_factors_for_denial: No demonstrated hardship or site constraint
Development out of character for neighborhood

sample_citations.key_reasoning: Appeal allowed - DA/SA had Approved. Board found grounds to allow the development.
Appeal allowed - DA/SA had Approved. Board found grounds to allow the development.
Appeal denied - DA/SA had Approved. Board upheld original decision or found grounds to deny.
Appeal denied - DA/SA had Approved. Board upheld original decision or found grounds to deny.
Partial approval - DA/SA had Approved. Board imposed conditions or partial modifications.

issues.recommendation: Document any site constraints justifying variances, analyze neighborhood development patterns, prepare responses to potential neighbor concerns, consider pre-application consultation with neighbors.

issues.description: Cannabis retail establishment development permit. Strict separation distance requirements from schools, parks, and other cannabis stores.
key_factors_for_approval: All separation distances from schools (150m+) verified and compliant
No over-concentration of cannabis stores in the area
Security measures and operating plan provided
No sensitive uses within required buffer distances
key_factors_for_denial: Within prohibited distance of schools or child care facilities
Too many existing cannabis stores in proximity
Inadequate separation from parks or recreation facilities
Community opposition based on concentration concerns
Location in residential-adjacent area with concerns

sample_citations.key_reasoning: Appeal allowed - DA/SA had REFUSED. Board found grounds to allow the development.
Appeal allowed - DA/SA had REFUSED. Board found grounds to allow the development.
Appeal denied - DA/SA had APPROVED. Board upheld original decision or found grounds to deny.
Appeal denied - DA/SA had REFUSED. Board upheld original decision or found grounds to deny.
Partial approval - DA/SA had APPROVED. Board imposed conditions or partial modifications.

issues.recommendation: Conduct thorough separation distance analysis, verify no schools within 150m (property line to property line), check for existing cannabis stores within 300m, prepare community benefit statement and security plan.

issues.description: Secondary suite within residential property requiring development permit. Issues typically involve parking, safety codes, and impact on neighborhood character.
key_factors_for_approval: Dedicated off-street parking provided or demonstrated as not necessary
Full compliance with building and safety codes
Minimal impact on neighborhood character and streetscape
Adequate egress and fire separation demonstrated
Support or no objection from immediate neighbors
key_factors_for_denial: Non-compliance with fire safety or building code requirements
Strong community opposition with valid concerns

sample_citations.key_reasoning: Appeal allowed - DA/SA had REFUSED. Board found grounds to allow the development.
Appeal allowed - DA/SA had APPROVED. Board found grounds to allow the development.
Appeal denied - DA/SA had APPROVED. Board upheld original decision or found grounds to deny.
Appeal denied - DA/SA had REFUSED. Board upheld original decision or found grounds to deny.
Partial approval - DA/SA had Approved. Board imposed conditions or partial modifications.

issues.recommendation: Ensure dedicated parking space, demonstrate full safety code compliance, prepare response to potential neighbor concerns about parking and density. Consider pre-application neighbor consultation.

issues.description: Multi-residential development such as apartment buildings, condominiums, or townhouse complexes. Issues include density, parking, and design.
key_factors_for_approval: Density appropriate for zoning and location
Adequate parking provision or justified reduction
key_factors_for_denial: Excessive density for the zone or location

sample_citations.key_reasoning: Appeal allowed - DA/SA had REFUSED. Board found grounds to allow the development.
Appeal allowed - DA/SA had Approved. Board found grounds to allow the development.
Appeal denied - DA/SA had Approved. Board upheld original decision or found grounds to deny.
Appeal denied - DA/SA had APPROVED. Board upheld original decision or found grounds to deny.
Partial approval - DA/SA had Approved. Board imposed conditions or partial modifications.

issues.recommendation: Prepare comprehensive traffic impact assessment, demonstrate parking adequacy or justify reductions, provide quality design documentation, conduct community engagement early in process.

issues.description: Accessory building such as garage suite, laneway home, or garden suite. Key issues include setbacks, height, shadowing, and privacy.
key_factors_for_approval: Minimal shadow impact on neighboring properties demonstrated
Privacy screening or mitigation measures proposed
Site constraints justify any variance requested
Height and massing compatible with neighborhood
Adequate separation from principal dwelling maintained
key_factors_for_denial: Excessive height or mass for the lot size
Shadow impact on neighboring outdoor spaces
Non-compliance with setback requirements without justification

sample_citations.key_reasoning: Appeal allowed - DA/SA had Approved. Board found grounds to allow the development.
Appeal allowed - DA/SA had Approved. Board found grounds to allow the development.
Appeal denied - DA/SA had APPROVED. Board upheld original decision or found grounds to deny.
Appeal denied - DA/SA had REFUSED. Board upheld original decision or found grounds to deny.
Partial approval - DA/SA had Approved. Board imposed conditions or partial modifications.

issues.recommendation: Prepare shadow studies for affected neighboring properties, document site constraints, propose privacy screening measures, and demonstrate compatibility with neighborhood development patterns.

issues.description: Sign variance or permit for commercial or advertising signage. Issues include size, illumination, safety, and visual impact.
key_factors_for_approval: Sign size and height appropriate for location
Temporary nature of sign if applicable
key_factors_for_denial: Excessive size or height for location
Safety concerns regarding traffic sight lines

sample_citations.key_reasoning: Appeal allowed - DA/SA had REFUSED. Board found grounds to allow the development.
Appeal allowed - DA/SA had REFUSED. Board found grounds to allow the development.
Appeal denied - DA/SA had REFUSED. Board upheld original decision or found grounds to deny.
Appeal denied - DA/SA had REFUSED. Board upheld original decision or found grounds to deny.
Partial approval - DA/SA had Refused. Board imposed conditions or partial modifications.

issues.recommendation: Provide photomontages showing sign in context, demonstrate safety compliance, show consistency with existing area signage, address any illumination concerns with technical specifications.

issues.description: Rowhouse or townhouse development project. Common issues include parking, lot coverage, and design compatibility.
key_factors_for_approval: Parking requirements met or justified variance
key_factors_for_denial: Design does not fit neighborhood character

sample_citations.key_reasoning: Appeal allowed - DA/SA had APPROVED. Board found grounds to allow the development.
Appeal allowed - DA/SA had Approved. Board found grounds to allow the development.
Appeal denied - DA/SA had Approved. Board upheld original decision or found grounds to deny.
Appeal denied - DA/SA had Approved. Board upheld original decision or found grounds to deny.
Partial approval - DA/SA had Approved. Board imposed conditions or partial modifications.

issues.recommendation: Address all parking requirements clearly, prepare lot coverage calculations, demonstrate design compatibility with neighborhood, provide landscape plan.

issues.description: Home-based business or occupation requiring development permit. Issues include traffic, parking, noise, and maintaining residential character.
key_factors_for_approval: Business operation does not change residential character
No significant increase in traffic or parking demand
No external signs or indication of business
Operating hours compatible with residential area
key_factors_for_denial: Noise, odor, or other disturbances to neighbors
Business scale exceeds home occupation limits

sample_citations.key_reasoning: Appeal allowed - DA/SA had Approved. Board found grounds to allow the development.
Appeal allowed - DA/SA had Approved. Board found grounds to allow the development.
Appeal denied - DA/SA had APPROVED. Board upheld original decision or found grounds to deny.
Appeal denied - DA/SA had REFUSED. Board upheld original decision or found grounds to deny.
Partial approval - DA/SA had APPROVED. Board imposed conditions or partial modifications.

issues.recommendation: Document business operations clearly, show traffic and parking will not impact neighbors, maintain residential character, prepare operating plan with hours and customer limits.

issues.description: Multi-residential development including townhouses, apartments, or condominiums.
key_factors_for_approval: Density justified by location and zoning

sample_citations.key_reasoning: Appeal allowed - DA/SA had APPROVED. Board found grounds to allow the development.
Appeal allowed - DA/SA had REFUSED. Board found grounds to allow the development.
Appeal denied - DA/SA had APPROVED. Board upheld original decision or found grounds to deny.
Appeal denied - DA/SA had REFUSED. Board upheld original decision or found grounds to deny.
Partial approval - DA/SA had APPROVED. Board imposed conditions or partial modifications.

issues.recommendation: Justify density with location analysis, document amenity provision, prepare quality design package, address parking and traffic comprehensively.

issues.display_name: Single Detached Dwelling w/ Accessory Residential Building
issues.description: Combined development of single detached dwelling with accessory residential building such as garage suite or backyard suite.
key_factors_for_approval: Lot size adequate for both structures
key_factors_for_denial: Combined impact too great for lot

sample_citations.key_reasoning: Appeal allowed - DA/SA had REFUSED. Board found grounds to allow the development.

issues.description: Cannabis store development permit with strict separation distance requirements from schools, other cannabis stores, and sensitive uses.
key_factors_for_approval: Verified 150m+ separation from school property boundaries
No other cannabis stores within 300m radius
key_factors_for_denial: Over-concentration of cannabis retail in area
Proximity to child care, recreation, or community facilities
Community opposition regarding sensitive land uses

sample_citations.key_reasoning: Appeal allowed - DA/SA had REFUSED. Board found grounds to allow the development.
Appeal allowed - DA/SA had Refused. Board found grounds to allow the development.
Appeal denied - DA/SA had REFUSED. Board upheld original decision or found grounds to deny.
Appeal denied - DA/SA had APPROVED. Board upheld original decision or found grounds to deny.
Partial approval - DA/SA had APPROVED. Board imposed conditions or partial modifications.

issues.recommendation: Obtain professional survey confirming all separation distances, map all existing cannabis stores and sensitive uses, prepare detailed security and operation plans, conduct community engagement.

issues.description: Liquor store development permit. Separation requirements from schools, community facilities, and other liquor stores apply.
key_factors_for_denial: Within prohibited distance of sensitive uses

Appeal allowed - DA/SA had Approved. Board found grounds to allow the development.

issues.description: Retail or consumer service commercial development. Issues include zoning compatibility, traffic, and hours of operation.

issues.description: Mixed use development combining residential and commercial uses.
key_factors_for_approval: Appropriate mix of uses for location

sample_citations.key_reasoning: Appeal allowed - DA/SA had APPROVED. Board found grounds to allow the development.
Appeal allowed - DA/SA had REFUSED. Board found grounds to allow the development.
Appeal denied - DA/SA had APPROVED. Board upheld original decision or found grounds to deny.

issues.description: Subdivision of land into smaller parcels. Issues include lot sizes, access, and infrastructure.

sample_citations.key_reasoning: Appeal allowed - DA/SA had DEEMED REFUSED. Board found grounds to allow the development.
Appeal denied - DA/SA had APPROVED. Board upheld original decision or found grounds to deny.

issues.description: Child care or daycare facility development permit. Issues include traffic, outdoor space, and neighbor concerns.
key_factors_for_approval: Safe drop-off and pick-up area provided

sample_citations.key_reasoning: Appeal allowed - DA/SA had Approved. Board found grounds to allow the development.
Appeal denied - DA/SA had APPROVED. Board upheld original decision or found grounds to deny.
Appeal denied - DA/SA had Approved. Board upheld original decision or found grounds to deny.

issues.recommendation: Design safe drop-off/pick-up areas, demonstrate adequate outdoor space, conduct neighbor consultation, prepare traffic management plan.

appeal_success_factors: Demonstrate unique hardship or site constraints that justify the variance
Show minimal impact on neighboring properties (shadow, privacy, views)
Provide evidence of neighborhood context and compatibility with existing development
Address all objections raised by neighbors or the City with specific responses
Document compliance with the intent of bylaws even if not the letter
Present professional supporting documentation (surveys, shadow studies, traffic analyses)
Conduct early consultation with neighbors to address concerns proactively
Propose conditions or mitigations to reduce impacts
common_denial_reasons: Excessive variance from required standards without justification
Significant unmitigated impact on neighboring properties
Non-compliance with safety or separation requirements
Strong community opposition with substantive concerns
Development out of character with established area
Non-compliance with mandatory requirements (fire, building code)
preparation_tips: Attend pre-application meetings with the City planning department
Conduct early consultation with immediate neighbors
Prepare detailed responses to anticipated objections
Research and cite precedent decisions for similar cases
Consider hiring professionals (planners, architects) for complex applications
Review and understand all relevant Land Use Bylaw sections
Document site constraints with professional surveys if applicable
Prepare visual materials (renderings, shadow studies) to illustrate proposals

appeal_process_notes.timeline: Appeals must typically be filed within 21 days of decision
appeal_process_notes.documentation: Bring all relevant drawings, reports, and correspondence to hearing
appeal_process_notes.representation: Applicants may represent themselves or hire a planner/lawyer
appeal_process_notes.neighbor_notification: Neighbors are typically notified of appeal hearings
appeal_process_notes.decision_timing: SDAB decisions are usually issued within 15 days of hearing

year_over_year_trends.note: Success rates have varied over time based on policy changes and board composition
year_over_year_trends.recent_trend: 2018-2023 showed lower success rates (47-52%), while 2024-2025 show improvement (57-69%)
year_over_year_trends.implication: Recent decisions may be more favorable, but thorough preparation remains essential

risk_level_guidance.HIGH: Less than 40% success rate - extensive preparation and strong justification needed
risk_level_guidance.MEDIUM: 40-55% success rate - moderate risk, thorough documentation recommended
risk_level_guidance.MODERATE: 55-70% success rate - reasonable chance of success with good preparation
risk_level_guidance.LOW: Above 70% success rate - favorable odds, but preparation still important
